mapper.select: select sc.company_id AS "companyId" , sc.company_name as "companyName" from SJK_COMPANY sc

select pd.dept_id as "deptId",pd.dept_name as "deptName" ,pd.fdept_id as "fDeptId" , sc.company_id as "companyId" from PT_DEPT pd inner join SJK_COMPANY sc on pd.company_id=sc.company_id where 1=1 and pd.fdept_id=#{fDeptId} and pd.company_id=#{companyId}
